isNotNull.isNotEmpty: AND EXISTS ( SELECT D.COMM_CD FROM BASS0300 D WHERE RPSTTV_CD = 'A007' AND TO_NUMBER(MANGE_ITEM01) >= TO_NUMBER(#searchWorkYearS#) AND D.DPOB_CD = A.DPOB_CD AND D.COMM_CD = A.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT E.COMM_CD FROM BASS0300 E WHERE RPSTTV_CD = 'A007' AND TO_NUMBER(MANGE_ITEM01) <= TO_NUMBER(#searchWorkYearE#) AND E.DPOB_CD = A.DPOB_CD AND E.COMM_CD = A.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD )

isNotNull.isEqual: NOT EXISTS (SELECT DISTINCT (TYP_OCCU_CD || NVL(PYSP_GRDE_CD,'A0060000')) FROM SYSM0100 WHERE SYSM0100.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.TYP_OCCU_CD = SYSM0100.TYP_OCCU_CD AND NVL(A.PYSP_GRDE_CD,'A0060000') = NVL(SYSM0100.PYSP_GRDE_CD,'A0060000') )

sqlMap.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY (SELECT LPAD(DEPT_RANK,5,'0') FROM BASS0400 NN WHERE NN.DEPT_CD = A.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD) ,A.EMYMT_DIV_CD,A.TYP_OCCU_CD, A.PYSP_GRDE_CD,A.RESN_REGN_NUM ) AS RNUM ,FCBASS0400CDNM (A.DPOB_CD, A.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD, '2') AS CURR_DEPT_NM ,FCBASS0400CDNM (A.DPOB_CD, A.DEPT_CD, '2') AS DEPT_NM ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, A.EMYMT_DIV_CD) as EMYMT_DIV_NM ,A.HAN_NM ,SUBSTR(A.RESN_REGN_NUM,0,6)||'-'||SUBSTR(A.RESN_REGN_NUM,7) AS RESN_REGN_NUM ,(fcBass0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD,A.TYP_OCCU_CD) || DECODE(NVL(A.PYSP_GRDE_CD,'A0060000'), 'A0060000','','[' || fcBass0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD,A.PYSP_GRDE_CD) || ']' )) AS TYPE_OCCU_NM ,FCBASS0350CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, A.TYP_OCCU_CD,A.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD, '1' ) as DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_NM ,FCBASS0500CDNM (A.DPOB_CD, SUBSTR (A.EMYMT_BGNN_DT, 1, 4), A.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD, A.BUSIN_CD) AS BUSIN_NM ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, A.HDOFC_CODTN_CD) as HDOFC_CODTN_NM ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, B.DSAGE_DIV_CD) as DSAGE_DIV_CD ,DECODE(LENGTH(B.ENRLNT_DT), 8, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.ENRLNT_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY.MM.DD'),B.ENRLNT_DT) AS ENRLNT_DT ,DECODE(LENGTH(B.DSAGE_DT), 8, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.DSAGE_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY.MM.DD'),B.DSAGE_DT) AS DSAGE_DT ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, B.SERVC_RCGTN_PRID_CD) as SERVC_RCGTN_PRID_CD ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, B.SRVSS_CD) as SRVSS_CD ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, B.BAGGRP_CD) as BAGGRP_CD ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, B.ABOTS_CD) as ABOTS_CD ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, B.CLS_CD) as CLS_CD ,B.MITY_SILNUM ,B.MOS ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, B.EXMTN_REAS_CD) as EXMTN_REAS_CD ,A.SYSTEMKEY FROM PSNL0100 A, PSNL0112 B WHERE A.DPOB_CD = B.DPOB_CD(+) AND A.SYSTEMKEY = B.SYSTEMKEY(+)
AND B.DSAGE_DIV_CD = #searchDsageDivCd#
AND SUBSTR(B.DSAGE_DT,1,6) >= #searchDsageDtS#
AND SUBSTR(B.DSAGE_DT,1,6) <= #searchDsageDtE#
AND B.BAGGRP_CD = #searchBaggrpCd#
AND B.ABOTS_CD = #searchAbotsCd#
AND B.CLS_CD = #searchClsCd#

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY (SELECT LPAD(DEPT_RANK,5,'0') FROM BASS0400 NN WHERE NN.DEPT_CD = A.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD) ,A.EMYMT_DIV_CD,A.TYP_OCCU_CD, A.PYSP_GRDE_CD,A.RESN_REGN_NUM ) AS RNUM ,FCBASS0400CDNM (A.DPOB_CD, A.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD, '2') AS CURR_DEPT_NM ,FCBASS0400CDNM (A.DPOB_CD, A.DEPT_CD, '2') AS DEPT_NM ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, A.EMYMT_DIV_CD) as EMYMT_DIV_NM ,A.HAN_NM ,SUBSTR(A.RESN_REGN_NUM,0,6)||'-'||SUBSTR(A.RESN_REGN_NUM,7) AS RESN_REGN_NUM ,(fcBass0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD,A.TYP_OCCU_CD) || DECODE(NVL(A.PYSP_GRDE_CD,'A0060000'), 'A0060000','','[' || fcBass0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD,A.PYSP_GRDE_CD) || ']' )) AS TYPE_OCCU_NM ,FCBASS0350CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, A.TYP_OCCU_CD,A.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD, '1' ) as DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_NM ,FCBASS0500CDNM (A.DPOB_CD, SUBSTR (A.EMYMT_BGNN_DT, 1, 4), A.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD, A.BUSIN_CD) AS BUSIN_NM ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, A.HDOFC_CODTN_CD) as HDOFC_CODTN_NM ,DECODE(LENGTH(B.JN_DT), 8, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.JN_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY.MM.DD'),B.JN_DT) AS JN_DT ,B.JN_OPZTN_NM ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, B.ODTY_CD) as ODTY_CD ,DECODE(LENGTH(B.WIRL_DT), 8, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.WIRL_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY.MM.DD'),B.WIRL_DT) AS WIRL_DT ,A.SYSTEMKEY FROM PSNL0100 A, PSNL0114 B WHERE A.DPOB_CD = B.DPOB_CD(+) AND A.SYSTEMKEY = B.SYSTEMKEY(+) AND B.OPZTN_SEIL_NUM IS NOT NULL
AND B.JN_OPZTN_NM LIKE '%' || #searchjnOpztnNm# || '%'
AND SUBSTR(B.JN_DT,1,6) >= #searchJnDtS#
AND SUBSTR(B.JN_DT,1,6) <= #searchJnDtE#

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY (SELECT LPAD(DEPT_RANK,5,'0') FROM BASS0400 NN WHERE NN.DEPT_CD = A.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD) ,A.EMYMT_DIV_CD,A.TYP_OCCU_CD, A.PYSP_GRDE_CD,A.RESN_REGN_NUM ) AS RNUM ,FCBASS0400CDNM (A.DPOB_CD, A.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD, '2') AS CURR_DEPT_NM ,FCBASS0400CDNM (A.DPOB_CD, A.DEPT_CD, '2') AS DEPT_NM ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, A.EMYMT_DIV_CD) as EMYMT_DIV_NM ,A.HAN_NM ,SUBSTR(A.RESN_REGN_NUM,0,6)||'-'||SUBSTR(A.RESN_REGN_NUM,7) AS RESN_REGN_NUM ,(fcBass0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD,A.TYP_OCCU_CD) || DECODE(NVL(A.PYSP_GRDE_CD,'A0060000'), 'A0060000','','[' || fcBass0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD,A.PYSP_GRDE_CD) || ']' )) AS TYPE_OCCU_NM ,FCBASS0350CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, A.TYP_OCCU_CD,A.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD, '1' ) as DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_NM ,FCBASS0500CDNM (A.DPOB_CD, SUBSTR (A.EMYMT_BGNN_DT, 1, 4), A.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD, A.BUSIN_CD) AS BUSIN_NM ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, A.HDOFC_CODTN_CD) as HDOFC_CODTN_NM ,DECODE(LENGTH(B.ETNC_ITSHL_DT), 8, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.ETNC_ITSHL_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY.MM.DD'),B.ETNC_ITSHL_DT) AS ETNC_ITSHL_DT ,DECODE(LENGTH(B.GRDTN_DT), 8, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.GRDTN_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY.MM.DD'),B.GRDTN_DT) AS GRDTN_DT ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, B.ACAD_ABTY_DIV_CD) as ACAD_ABTY_DIV_CD ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, B.SCHL_CD) as SCHL_CD ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, B.DEPR_MAJR_CD) as DEPR_MAJR_CD ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, B.DEGR_DIV_CD) as DEGR_DIV_CD ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, B.LESN_YR_NUM_CD) as LESN_YR_NUM_CD ,B.ACAD_ABTY_NOTE_CTNT ,A.SYSTEMKEY FROM PSNL0100 A, PSNL0116 B WHERE A.DPOB_CD = B.DPOB_CD(+) AND A.SYSTEMKEY = B.SYSTEMKEY(+) AND B.ACAD_ABTY_SEIL_NUM IS NOT NULL
AND B.ACAD_ABTY_DIV_CD = #searchAcadAbtyDivCd#
AND B.DEGR_DIV_CD = #searchDegrDivCd#
AND B.DEPR_MAJR_CD = #searchDeprMajrCd#
AND B.SCHL_CD = #searchSchlCd#

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY (SELECT LPAD(DEPT_RANK,5,'0') FROM BASS0400 NN WHERE NN.DEPT_CD = A.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD) ,A.EMYMT_DIV_CD,A.TYP_OCCU_CD, A.PYSP_GRDE_CD,A.RESN_REGN_NUM ) AS RNUM ,FCBASS0400CDNM (A.DPOB_CD, A.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD, '2') AS CURR_DEPT_NM ,FCBASS0400CDNM (A.DPOB_CD, A.DEPT_CD, '2') AS DEPT_NM ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, A.EMYMT_DIV_CD) as EMYMT_DIV_NM ,A.HAN_NM ,SUBSTR(A.RESN_REGN_NUM,0,6)||'-'||SUBSTR(A.RESN_REGN_NUM,7) AS RESN_REGN_NUM ,(fcBass0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD,A.TYP_OCCU_CD) || DECODE(NVL(A.PYSP_GRDE_CD,'A0060000'), 'A0060000','','[' || fcBass0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD,A.PYSP_GRDE_CD) || ']' )) AS TYPE_OCCU_NM ,FCBASS0350CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, A.TYP_OCCU_CD,A.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD, '1' ) as DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_NM ,FCBASS0500CDNM (A.DPOB_CD, SUBSTR (A.EMYMT_BGNN_DT, 1, 4), A.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD, A.BUSIN_CD) AS BUSIN_NM ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, A.HDOFC_CODTN_CD) as HDOFC_CODTN_NM ,DECODE(LENGTH(B.CARR_BGNN_DT), 8, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.CARR_BGNN_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY.MM.DD'),B.CARR_BGNN_DT) AS CARR_BGNN_DT ,DECODE(LENGTH(B.CARR_END_DT), 8, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.CARR_END_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY.MM.DD'),B.CARR_END_DT) AS CARR_END_DT ,B.PAE_WORK_NM ,B.ODTY_NM ,B.REPBTY_BUSIN_NM ,B.CARR_NOTE_CTNT ,A.SYSTEMKEY FROM PSNL0100 A, PSNL0119 B WHERE A.DPOB_CD = B.DPOB_CD(+) AND A.SYSTEMKEY = B.SYSTEMKEY(+) AND B.CARR_RSPT_SEIL_NUM IS NOT NULL
AND B.PAE_WORK_NM LIKE '%' || #searchPaeWorkNm# || '%'
AND SUBSTR(B.CARR_BGNN_DT,1,6) >= #searchCarrBgnnDtS#
AND SUBSTR(B.CARR_BGNN_DT,1,6) <= #searchCarrBgnnDtE#

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY (SELECT LPAD(DEPT_RANK,5,'0') FROM BASS0400 NN WHERE NN.DEPT_CD = A.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD) ,A.EMYMT_DIV_CD,A.TYP_OCCU_CD, A.PYSP_GRDE_CD,A.RESN_REGN_NUM ) AS RNUM ,FCBASS0400CDNM (A.DPOB_CD, A.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD, '2') AS CURR_DEPT_NM ,FCBASS0400CDNM (A.DPOB_CD, A.DEPT_CD, '2') AS DEPT_NM ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, A.EMYMT_DIV_CD) as EMYMT_DIV_NM ,A.HAN_NM ,SUBSTR(A.RESN_REGN_NUM,0,6)||'-'||SUBSTR(A.RESN_REGN_NUM,7) AS RESN_REGN_NUM ,(fcBass0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD,A.TYP_OCCU_CD) || DECODE(NVL(A.PYSP_GRDE_CD,'A0060000'), 'A0060000','','[' || fcBass0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD,A.PYSP_GRDE_CD) || ']' )) AS TYPE_OCCU_NM ,FCBASS0350CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, A.TYP_OCCU_CD,A.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD, '1' ) as DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_NM ,FCBASS0500CDNM (A.DPOB_CD, SUBSTR (A.EMYMT_BGNN_DT, 1, 4), A.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD, A.BUSIN_CD) AS BUSIN_NM ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, A.HDOFC_CODTN_CD) as HDOFC_CODTN_NM ,DECODE(LENGTH(B.AQTN_DT), 8, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.AQTN_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY.MM.DD'),B.AQTN_DT) AS AQTN_DT ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, B.QFTNT_LICNS_CD) as QFTNT_LICNS_CD ,B.QFTNT_LICNS_POVNC_CTNT ,B.EFMN_ISTUT_NM ,B.QFTNT_LICNS_NUM ,A.SYSTEMKEY FROM PSNL0100 A, PSNL0118 B WHERE A.DPOB_CD = B.DPOB_CD(+) AND A.SYSTEMKEY = B.SYSTEMKEY(+) AND B.QFTNT_LICNS_SEIL_NUM IS NOT NULL
AND B.QFTNT_LICNS_NUM LIKE '%' || #searchQftntLicnsNum# || '%'
AND SUBSTR(B.AQTN_DT,1,6) >= #searchAqtnDtS#
AND SUBSTR(B.AQTN_DT,1,6) <= #searchAqtnDtE#

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY (SELECT LPAD(DEPT_RANK,5,'0') FROM BASS0400 NN WHERE NN.DEPT_CD = A.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD) ,A.EMYMT_DIV_CD,A.TYP_OCCU_CD, A.PYSP_GRDE_CD,A.RESN_REGN_NUM ) AS RNUM ,FCBASS0400CDNM (A.DPOB_CD, A.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD, '2') AS CURR_DEPT_NM ,FCBASS0400CDNM (A.DPOB_CD, A.DEPT_CD, '2') AS DEPT_NM ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, A.EMYMT_DIV_CD) as EMYMT_DIV_NM ,A.HAN_NM ,SUBSTR(A.RESN_REGN_NUM,0,6)||'-'||SUBSTR(A.RESN_REGN_NUM,7) AS RESN_REGN_NUM ,(fcBass0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD,A.TYP_OCCU_CD) || DECODE(NVL(A.PYSP_GRDE_CD,'A0060000'), 'A0060000','','[' || fcBass0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD,A.PYSP_GRDE_CD) || ']' )) AS TYPE_OCCU_NM ,FCBASS0350CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, A.TYP_OCCU_CD,A.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD, '1' ) as DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_NM ,FCBASS0500CDNM (A.DPOB_CD, SUBSTR (A.EMYMT_BGNN_DT, 1, 4), A.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD, A.BUSIN_CD) AS BUSIN_NM ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, A.HDOFC_CODTN_CD) as HDOFC_CODTN_NM ,DECODE(LENGTH(B.EDU_BGNN_DT), 8, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.EDU_BGNN_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY.MM.DD'),B.EDU_BGNN_DT) AS EDU_BGNN_DT ,DECODE(LENGTH(B.EDU_END_DT), 8, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.EDU_END_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY.MM.DD'),B.EDU_END_DT) AS EDU_END_DT ,B.EDU_CMPTE_TM ,B.EDU_KND_NM ,B.EDU_ISTUT_NM ,B.EDU_NOTE_CTNT ,A.SYSTEMKEY FROM PSNL0100 A, PSNL0120 B WHERE A.DPOB_CD = B.DPOB_CD(+) AND A.SYSTEMKEY = B.SYSTEMKEY(+) AND B.EDU_SEIL_NUM IS NOT NULL
AND B.EDU_KND_NM LIKE '%' || #searchEduKndNm# || '%'
AND SUBSTR(B.EDU_BGNN_DT,1,6) >= #searchEduBgnnDtS#
AND SUBSTR(B.EDU_BGNN_DT,1,6) <= #searchEduBgnnDtE#

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY (SELECT LPAD(DEPT_RANK,5,'0') FROM BASS0400 NN WHERE NN.DEPT_CD = A.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD) ,A.EMYMT_DIV_CD,A.TYP_OCCU_CD, A.PYSP_GRDE_CD,A.RESN_REGN_NUM ) AS RNUM ,FCBASS0400CDNM (A.DPOB_CD, A.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD, '2') AS CURR_DEPT_NM ,FCBASS0400CDNM (A.DPOB_CD, A.DEPT_CD, '2') AS DEPT_NM ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, A.EMYMT_DIV_CD) as EMYMT_DIV_NM ,A.HAN_NM ,SUBSTR(A.RESN_REGN_NUM,0,6)||'-'||SUBSTR(A.RESN_REGN_NUM,7) AS RESN_REGN_NUM ,(fcBass0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD,A.TYP_OCCU_CD) || DECODE(NVL(A.PYSP_GRDE_CD,'A0060000'), 'A0060000','','[' || fcBass0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD,A.PYSP_GRDE_CD) || ']' )) AS TYPE_OCCU_NM ,FCBASS0350CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, A.TYP_OCCU_CD,A.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD, '1' ) as DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_NM ,FCBASS0500CDNM (A.DPOB_CD, SUBSTR (A.EMYMT_BGNN_DT, 1, 4), A.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD, A.BUSIN_CD) AS BUSIN_NM ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, A.HDOFC_CODTN_CD) as HDOFC_CODTN_NM ,B.ACCLD_YR ,DECODE(LENGTH(B.ACCLD_PRTT_DT), 8, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.ACCLD_PRTT_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY.MM.DD'),B.ACCLD_PRTT_DT) AS ACCLD_PRTT_DT ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, B.ACCLD_KND_CD) as ACCLD_KND_CD ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, B.ACCLD_DIV_CD) as ACCLD_DIV_CD ,B.ACCLD_NM ,B.ACCLD_CFMNT_NUM ,B.EFMN_ISTUT_NM ,B.ACCLD_MNANT_CTNT ,B.ACCLD_NOTE_CTNT ,A.SYSTEMKEY FROM PSNL0100 A, PSNL0121 B WHERE A.DPOB_CD = B.DPOB_CD(+) AND A.SYSTEMKEY = B.SYSTEMKEY(+) AND B.ACCLD_SEIL_NUM IS NOT NULL

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY (SELECT LPAD(DEPT_RANK,5,'0') FROM BASS0400 NN WHERE NN.DEPT_CD = A.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD) ,A.EMYMT_DIV_CD,A.TYP_OCCU_CD, A.PYSP_GRDE_CD,A.RESN_REGN_NUM ) AS RNUM ,FCBASS0400CDNM (A.DPOB_CD, A.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD, '2') AS CURR_DEPT_NM ,FCBASS0400CDNM (A.DPOB_CD, A.DEPT_CD, '2') AS DEPT_NM ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, A.EMYMT_DIV_CD) as EMYMT_DIV_NM ,A.HAN_NM ,SUBSTR(A.RESN_REGN_NUM,0,6)||'-'||SUBSTR(A.RESN_REGN_NUM,7) AS RESN_REGN_NUM ,(fcBass0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD,A.TYP_OCCU_CD) || DECODE(NVL(A.PYSP_GRDE_CD,'A0060000'), 'A0060000','','[' || fcBass0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD,A.PYSP_GRDE_CD) || ']' )) AS TYPE_OCCU_NM ,FCBASS0350CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, A.TYP_OCCU_CD,A.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD, '1' ) as DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_NM ,FCBASS0500CDNM (A.DPOB_CD, SUBSTR (A.EMYMT_BGNN_DT, 1, 4), A.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD, A.BUSIN_CD) AS BUSIN_NM ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, A.HDOFC_CODTN_CD) as HDOFC_CODTN_NM ,DECODE(LENGTH(B.DSNY_ACT_DSPL_DT), 8, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.DSNY_ACT_DSPL_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY.MM.DD'),B.DSNY_ACT_DSPL_DT) AS DSNY_ACT_DSPL_DT ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, B.DSNY_ACT_DIV_CD) as DSNY_ACT_DIV_CD ,B.DSNY_ACT_NM ,B.DSNY_ACT_REAS_CTNT ,B.DSNY_ACT_ECTG_ORGN ,DECODE(LENGTH(B.DSNY_ACT_BGNN_DT), 8, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.DSNY_ACT_BGNN_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY.MM.DD'),B.DSNY_ACT_BGNN_DT) AS DSNY_ACT_BGNN_DT ,DECODE(LENGTH(B.DSNY_ACT_END_DT), 8, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.DSNY_ACT_END_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY.MM.DD'),B.DSNY_ACT_END_DT) AS DSNY_ACT_END_DT ,DECODE(LENGTH(B.DSNY_ACT_ANSTY_DT), 8, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.DSNY_ACT_ANSTY_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY.MM.DD'),B.DSNY_ACT_ANSTY_DT) AS DSNY_ACT_ANSTY_DT ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, B.DSNY_ACT_ANSTY_DIV_CD) as DSNY_ACT_ANSTY_DIV_CD ,B.DSNY_ACT_CTWP_MNTH_ICM ,B.DSNY_ACT_NOTE_CTNT ,A.SYSTEMKEY FROM PSNL0100 A, PSNL0122 B WHERE A.DPOB_CD = B.DPOB_CD(+) AND A.SYSTEMKEY = B.SYSTEMKEY(+) AND B.DSNY_ACT_SEIL_NUM IS NOT NULL
AND B.DSNY_ACT_DIV_CD = #searchDsnyActDivCd#
AND SUBSTR(B.DSNY_ACT_DSPL_DT,1,6) >= #searchDsnyActDsplDtS#
AND SUBSTR(B.DSNY_ACT_DSPL_DT,1,6) <= #searchDsnyActDsplDtE#

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY (SELECT LPAD(DEPT_RANK,5,'0') FROM BASS0400 NN WHERE NN.DEPT_CD = A.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD) ,A.EMYMT_DIV_CD,A.TYP_OCCU_CD, A.PYSP_GRDE_CD,A.RESN_REGN_NUM ) AS RNUM ,FCBASS0400CDNM (A.DPOB_CD, A.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD, '2') AS CURR_DEPT_NM ,FCBASS0400CDNM (A.DPOB_CD, A.DEPT_CD, '2') AS DEPT_NM ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, A.EMYMT_DIV_CD) as EMYMT_DIV_NM ,A.HAN_NM ,SUBSTR(A.RESN_REGN_NUM,0,6)||'-'||SUBSTR(A.RESN_REGN_NUM,7) AS RESN_REGN_NUM ,(fcBass0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD,A.TYP_OCCU_CD) || DECODE(NVL(A.PYSP_GRDE_CD,'A0060000'), 'A0060000','','[' || fcBass0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD,A.PYSP_GRDE_CD) || ']' )) AS TYPE_OCCU_NM ,FCBASS0350CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, A.TYP_OCCU_CD,A.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD, '1' ) as DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_NM ,FCBASS0500CDNM (A.DPOB_CD, SUBSTR (A.EMYMT_BGNN_DT, 1, 4), A.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD, A.BUSIN_CD) AS BUSIN_NM ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, A.HDOFC_CODTN_CD) as HDOFC_CODTN_NM ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, B.LEVF_ABNC_DIV_CD) as LEVF_ABNC_DIV_CD ,DECODE(LENGTH(B.LEVF_ABNC_BGNN_DT), 8, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.LEVF_ABNC_BGNN_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY.MM.DD'),B.LEVF_ABNC_BGNN_DT) AS LEVF_ABNC_BGNN_DT ,DECODE(LENGTH(B.LEVF_ABNC_END_DT), 8, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.LEVF_ABNC_END_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY.MM.DD'),B.LEVF_ABNC_END_DT) AS LEVF_ABNC_END_DT ,DECODE(LENGTH(B.TURTY_RNTMNT_DT), 8, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.TURTY_RNTMNT_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY.MM.DD'),B.TURTY_RNTMNT_DT) AS TURTY_RNTMNT_DT ,B.LEVF_ABNC_NOTE_CTNT ,A.SYSTEMKEY FROM PSNL0100 A, PSNL0123 B WHERE A.DPOB_CD = B.DPOB_CD(+) AND A.SYSTEMKEY = B.SYSTEMKEY(+) AND B.LEVF_ABNC_SEIL_NUM IS NOT NULL
AND B.LEVF_ABNC_DIV_CD = #searchLevfAbncDivCd#
AND SUBSTR(B.LEVF_ABNC_BGNN_DT,1,6) >= #searchLevfAbncBgnnDtS#
AND SUBSTR(B.LEVF_ABNC_BGNN_DT,1,6) <= #searchLevfAbncBgnnDtE#
